bibl.title: The Children of Ptolemy III and the Date of the Exedra of Thermos.
bibl.note: I.G. IX, I2, 1, 56. The internal evidence of the exedra, both chronological and onomastic, is entirely consistent with a date of 239 or early 238. Estimation of the birth dates of the children of Ptolemy III and Berenice II.
bibl.seg: BENNETT Chris, The Children of Ptolemy III and the Date of the Exedra of Thermos.

I.G. IX, I2, 1, 56. The internal evidence of the exedra, both chronological and onomastic, is entirely consistent with a date of 239 or early 238. Estimation of the birth dates of the children of Ptolemy III and Berenice II.
